Instruction: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Finely chop the onions and garlic in a blender or food processor, then cook them in the skillet until they become tender. Puree the tomatoes and green bell pepper in the blender or food processor, and add them to the skillet. Season the mixture with salt, garam masala, and chili powder. Stir in the cream and butter, and keep cooking until everything is heated through.
